verses.verse: I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5324>standing<s%> beside the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5221>"Strike<s%> the <S%H3730>tops<s%> of the <S%H5592>pillars,<s%> that the thresholds may <S%H7493>shake;<s%> and <S%H1214>break<s%> them in pieces on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of all of <S%H2026>them;<s%> and I will kill the <S%H319>last<s%> of them with the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> there shall not one of them <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H5127>away,<s%> and there shall <S%H4422>not<s%> one of them <S%H6412>escape.<s%>

Though they <S%H2864>dig<s%> into <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> there my <S%H3027>hand<s%> will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5927>them;<s%> and though they climb up to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> there I will bring them <S%H3381>down.<s%>

Though they <S%H2244>hide<s%> themselves in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel,<s%> I will <S%H2664>search<s%> and take them <S%H3947>out<s%> <S%H5641>there;<s%> and though they be hidden from my <S%H5869>sight<s%> in the <S%H7172>bottom<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> there I will <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> and it will bite <S%H5391>them.<s%>

Though they <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> there I will <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and it will <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H7760>them.<s%> I will set my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on them for <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and not for <S%H2896>good.<s%>

For the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> is he who <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> and it <S%H4127>melts,<s%> and all who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in it will <S%H56>mourn;<s%> and it will rise <S%H5927>up<s%> wholly like the <S%H2975>River,<s%> and will <S%H8257>sink<s%> <S%H2975>again,<s%> like the River of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

It is he who <S%H1129>builds<s%> his <S%H4609>rooms<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and has <S%H3245>founded<s%> his <S%H92>vault<s%> on the <S%H776>earth;<s%> he who <S%H7121>calls<s%> for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and pours them <S%H8210>out<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Are you not like the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> children of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H5927>"Haven't<s%> I brought up <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H3731>Caphtor,<s%> and the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> from <S%H7024>Kir?<s%>

<S%H5869>Behold,<s%> the eyes of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> are on the <S%H2403>sinful<s%> <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> and I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> it from off the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>earth;<s%> <S%H657>except<s%> that I will not <S%H8045>utterly<s%> <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H6680>"For,<s%> behold, I will command, and I will <S%H5128>sift<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> among all the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> as grain is <S%H5128>sifted<s%> in a <S%H3531>sieve,<s%> yet not the least <S%H6872>kernel<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
All the <S%H2400>sinners<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> who <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7451><s%> 'Evil <S%H5066>won't<s%> overtake nor meet <S%H6923>us.<s%>'

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H5521>tent<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> who is <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> and close <S%H1443>up<s%> its <S%H6556>breaches,<s%> and I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> its <S%H2034>ruins,<s%> and I will <S%H1129>build<s%> it as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old;<s%>

that they may <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> who are <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who does <S%H6213>this.<s%>

<S%H3117>"Behold,<s%> the days <S%H935>come,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "that the <S%H2790>plowman<s%> shall <S%H5066>overtake<s%> the <S%H7114>reaper,<s%> and the one <S%H1869>treading<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%> him who <S%H4900>sows<s%> <S%H2233>seed;<s%> and sweet <S%H6071>wine<s%> will <S%H5197>drip<s%> from the <S%H1389>mountains,<s%> and <S%H4127>flow<s%> from the <S%H1389>hills.<s%>

I will bring my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> from <S%H7622>captivity,<s%> and they will <S%H1129>rebuild<s%> the <S%H8074>ruined<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> <S%H5193>them;<s%> and they will plant <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> from <S%H6213>them.<s%> They shall also make <S%H1593>gardens,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

I will <S%H5193>plant<s%> them on their <S%H127>land,<s%> and they will no more be plucked <S%H5428>up<s%> out of their <S%H127>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
